    • Method Detail

      • openFile

        public static java.io.File openFile(javafx.stage.Window stage)
        This method uses a FileChooser Object to select a File and return said File. Requires a Window object as input, and will always be "Paint.window"
        Parameters:
        stage - Parent Stage
        Returns:
        The Selected File

      • saveAsFile

        public static void saveAsFile(javafx.stage.Window stage)
        This method is responsible for the "Save As" functionality of Paint
        Parameters:
        stage -

      • saveFile

        public static void saveFile()
        This method is responsible for saving Paint.opened_image into Paint.opened_file. It implements a "Smart" save, because if opened_file is null, it will instead launch the "saveAsFile" method.
